question: Why does wattage no longer directly indicate the amount of light produced?
mc_answer1: Because the design of light fixtures has changed
mc_answer2: Because new lighting technologies have different efficacies in converting electrical energy to visible light
translated_passage: ልሙድ 'ናይ ብርሃን ኣምፑል' ዝበሃል ላምባታት እቲ ዝእለን ዝትክእን ክፋል ናይ ሓደ መብራህቲ መትሓዚ ኮይኑ፡ ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ኤሌክትሮማግኔቲክ ጨረርታ ዝቕይር እዩ። ላምባታት ብባህሊ ብባህሊ ብመንፅር ሃልኪ ሓይሎም ደረጃ ክወሃቦምን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ክቐርቡን እንከለዉ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ምብዛሕ ቴክኖሎጂ መብራህቲ ኪኖ እቲ ብርሃን ዝፈጥር ኣምፑል ንዋት ዋት ምስቲ ዝፈረየ ብርሃን ኣወጊድዎ እዩ። ንኣብነት 60 W incandescent wild bulb ኣስታት ተመሳሳሊ መጠን ብርሃን ምስ 13W ውሱን ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ የፍሪ። ነፍሲ ወከፍ ካብዞም ቴክኖሎጂታት ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ዝርአ ብርሃን ኣብ ምቕያር ዝተፈላለየ ውጽኢታዊነት ኣለዎ። ዝርአ ውጽኢት ብርሃን ብተለምዶ ብሉመንስ ይዕቀን። እዚ ኣሃዱ እዚ ነቲ ዝርአ ጨረርታ ጥራይ ብቑጽሪ ይገልጾ፣ ዘይርአ ትሕተ ቀይሕን ኣልትራቫዮሌትን ብርሃን ድማ የግልል። ናይ ሰም ሽምዓ ኣብ 13Lumens ቅርበት ዘለዎ ቅደም ተኸተል ትፈሪ፣ 60 ዋት ዝዓይነታ ብርሃን ዝህብ ላምባ ከባቢ 700 ሉመንስ ይገብር፣ 15 ዋት ዝዓይነቱ ውህሉል ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ ድማ ኣስታት 800 ሉመንስ የፍሪ፣ ግን ጭቡጥ ውጽኢት ብፍሉይ ዲዛይን ይፈላለ። ደረጃን ዕዳጋን ትኹረቱ ካብ ዋትን ናብ ውጽኢት ሉመንን ርሒቑ ይሰጋገር ኣሎ፣ ነቲ ዓዳጊ ብቐጥታ ዝትግበር መሰረት ንምሃብ ላምባ ዝመርጽሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ስለምንታይ እዩ ዋትጅ ድሕሪ ደጊም ብቐጥታ ዝፍረዮ ብርሃን ዘመልክት?
translated_mc_answer1: ምኽንያቱ ዲዛይን ናይ መብራህቲ መትሓዚታት ተቐይሩ .
translated_mc_answer2: ምኽንያቱ ሓደስቲ ቴክኖሎጂታት መብራህቲ ኣብ ምቕያር ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ዝርአ ብርሃን ዝተፈላለየ ውጽኢታዊነት ስለ ዘለዎም .
translated_mc_answer3: ምኽንያቱ ተጠቀምቲ ጸዓት ዝውሕድ ዲዛይናት ስለ ዝመርጹ .

passage: Commonly called 'light bulbs', lamps are the removable and replaceable part of a light fixture, which converts electrical energy into electromagnetic radiation. While lamps have traditionally been rated and marketed primarily in terms of their power consumption, expressed in watts, proliferation of lighting technology beyond the incandescent light bulb has eliminated the correspondence of wattage to the amount of light produced. For example, a 60 W incandescent light bulb produces about the same amount of light as a 13W compact fluorescent lamp. Each of these technologies has a different efficacy in converting electrical energy to visible light. Visible light output is typically measured in lumens. This unit only quantifies the visible radiation, and excludes invisible infrared and ultraviolet light. A wax candle produces on the close order of 13lumens, a 60 watt incandescent lamp makes around 700 lumens, and a 15-watt compact fluorescent lamp produces about 800 lumens, but actual output varies by specific design. Rating and marketing emphasis is shifting away from wattage and towards lumen output, to give the purchaser a directly applicable basis upon which to select a lamp.
question: According to the passage, how much visible light output does a wax candle produce?
translated_passage: ልሙድ 'ናይ ብርሃን ኣምፑል' ዝበሃል ላምባታት እቲ ዝእለን ዝትክእን ክፋል ናይ ሓደ መብራህቲ መትሓዚ ኮይኑ፡ ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ኤሌክትሮማግኔቲክ ጨረርታ ዝቕይር እዩ። ላምባታት ብባህሊ ብባህሊ ብመንፅር ሃልኪ ሓይሎም ደረጃ ክወሃቦምን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ክቐርቡን እንከለዉ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ምብዛሕ ቴክኖሎጂ መብራህቲ ኪኖ እቲ ብርሃን ዝፈጥር ኣምፑል ንዋት ዋት ምስቲ ዝፈረየ ብርሃን ኣወጊድዎ እዩ። ንኣብነት 60 W incandescent wild bulb ኣስታት ተመሳሳሊ መጠን ብርሃን ምስ 13W ውሱን ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ የፍሪ። ነፍሲ ወከፍ ካብዞም ቴክኖሎጂታት ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ዝርአ ብርሃን ኣብ ምቕያር ዝተፈላለየ ውጽኢታዊነት ኣለዎ። ዝርአ ውጽኢት ብርሃን ብተለምዶ ብሉመንስ ይዕቀን። እዚ ኣሃዱ እዚ ነቲ ዝርአ ጨረርታ ጥራይ ብቑጽሪ ይገልጾ፣ ዘይርአ ትሕተ ቀይሕን ኣልትራቫዮሌትን ብርሃን ድማ የግልል። ናይ ሰም ሽምዓ ኣብ 13Lumens ቅርበት ዘለዎ ቅደም ተኸተል ትፈሪ፣ 60 ዋት ዝዓይነታ ብርሃን ዝህብ ላምባ ከባቢ 700 ሉመንስ ይገብር፣ 15 ዋት ዝዓይነቱ ውህሉል ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ ድማ ኣስታት 800 ሉመንስ የፍሪ፣ ግን ጭቡጥ ውጽኢት ብፍሉይ ዲዛይን ይፈላለ። ደረጃን ዕዳጋን ትኹረቱ ካብ ዋትን ናብ ውጽኢት ሉመንን ርሒቑ ይሰጋገር ኣሎ፣ ነቲ ዓዳጊ ብቐጥታ ዝትግበር መሰረት ንምሃብ ላምባ ዝመርጽሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ መሕለፊ ክንደይ ዝርአ ውጽኢት ብርሃን ሓደ ሰም ሽምዓ እዩ ዘፍሪ?

translated_passage: ልሙድ 'ናይ ብርሃን ኣምፑል' ዝበሃል ላምባታት እቲ ዝእለን ዝትክእን ክፋል ናይ ሓደ መብራህቲ መትሓዚ ኮይኑ፡ ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ኤሌክትሮማግኔቲክ ጨረርታ ዝቕይር እዩ። ላምባታት ብባህሊ ብባህሊ ብመንፅር ሃልኪ ሓይሎም ደረጃ ክወሃቦምን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ክቐርቡን እንከለዉ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ምብዛሕ ቴክኖሎጂ መብራህቲ ኪኖ እቲ ብርሃን ዝፈጥር ኣምፑል ንዋት ዋት ምስቲ ዝፈረየ ብርሃን ኣወጊድዎ እዩ። ንኣብነት 60 W incandescent wild bulb ኣስታት ተመሳሳሊ መጠን ብርሃን ምስ 13W ውሱን ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ የፍሪ። ነፍሲ ወከፍ ካብዞም ቴክኖሎጂታት ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ዝርአ ብርሃን ኣብ ምቕያር ዝተፈላለየ ውጽኢታዊነት ኣለዎ። ዝርአ ውጽኢት ብርሃን ብተለምዶ ብሉመንስ ይዕቀን። እዚ ኣሃዱ እዚ ነቲ ዝርአ ጨረርታ ጥራይ ብቑጽሪ ይገልጾ፣ ዘይርአ ትሕተ ቀይሕን ኣልትራቫዮሌትን ብርሃን ድማ የግልል። ናይ ሰም ሽምዓ ኣብ 13Lumens ቅርበት ዘለዎ ቅደም ተኸተል ትፈሪ፣ 60 ዋት ዝዓይነታ ብርሃን ዝህብ ላምባ ከባቢ 700 ሉመንስ ይገብር፣ 15 ዋት ዝዓይነቱ ውህሉል ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ ድማ ኣስታት 800 ሉመንስ የፍሪ፣ ግን ጭቡጥ ውጽኢት ብፍሉይ ዲዛይን ይፈላለ። ደረጃን ዕዳጋን ትኹረቱ ካብ ዋትን ናብ ውጽኢት ሉመንን ርሒቑ ይሰጋገር ኣሎ፣ ነቲ ዓዳጊ ብቐጥታ ዝትግበር መሰረት ንምሃብ ላምባ ዝመርጽሉ እዩ።

passage: Commonly called 'light bulbs', lamps are the removable and replaceable part of a light fixture, which converts electrical energy into electromagnetic radiation. While lamps have traditionally been rated and marketed primarily in terms of their power consumption, expressed in watts, proliferation of lighting technology beyond the incandescent light bulb has eliminated the correspondence of wattage to the amount of light produced. For example, a 60 W incandescent light bulb produces about the same amount of light as a 13W compact fluorescent lamp. Each of these technologies has a different efficacy in converting electrical energy to visible light. Visible light output is typically measured in lumens. This unit only quantifies the visible radiation, and excludes invisible infrared and ultraviolet light. A wax candle produces on the close order of 13lumens, a 60 watt incandescent lamp makes around 700 lumens, and a 15-watt compact fluorescent lamp produces about 800 lumens, but actual output varies by specific design. Rating and marketing emphasis is shifting away from wattage and towards lumen output, to give the purchaser a directly applicable basis upon which to select a lamp.
question: What shift in marketing emphasis for lamps is highlighted in the passage?
translated_passage: ልሙድ 'ናይ ብርሃን ኣምፑል' ዝበሃል ላምባታት እቲ ዝእለን ዝትክእን ክፋል ናይ ሓደ መብራህቲ መትሓዚ ኮይኑ፡ ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ኤሌክትሮማግኔቲክ ጨረርታ ዝቕይር እዩ። ላምባታት ብባህሊ ብባህሊ ብመንፅር ሃልኪ ሓይሎም ደረጃ ክወሃቦምን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ክቐርቡን እንከለዉ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ብዋት ዝግለጽ፣ ምብዛሕ ቴክኖሎጂ መብራህቲ ኪኖ እቲ ብርሃን ዝፈጥር ኣምፑል ንዋት ዋት ምስቲ ዝፈረየ ብርሃን ኣወጊድዎ እዩ። ንኣብነት 60 W incandescent wild bulb ኣስታት ተመሳሳሊ መጠን ብርሃን ምስ 13W ውሱን ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ የፍሪ። ነፍሲ ወከፍ ካብዞም ቴክኖሎጂታት ጸዓት ኤሌክትሪክ ናብ ዝርአ ብርሃን ኣብ ምቕያር ዝተፈላለየ ውጽኢታዊነት ኣለዎ። ዝርአ ውጽኢት ብርሃን ብተለምዶ ብሉመንስ ይዕቀን። እዚ ኣሃዱ እዚ ነቲ ዝርአ ጨረርታ ጥራይ ብቑጽሪ ይገልጾ፣ ዘይርአ ትሕተ ቀይሕን ኣልትራቫዮሌትን ብርሃን ድማ የግልል። ናይ ሰም ሽምዓ ኣብ 13Lumens ቅርበት ዘለዎ ቅደም ተኸተል ትፈሪ፣ 60 ዋት ዝዓይነታ ብርሃን ዝህብ ላምባ ከባቢ 700 ሉመንስ ይገብር፣ 15 ዋት ዝዓይነቱ ውህሉል ፍሎረሰንት ላምባ ድማ ኣስታት 800 ሉመንስ የፍሪ፣ ግን ጭቡጥ ውጽኢት ብፍሉይ ዲዛይን ይፈላለ። ደረጃን ዕዳጋን ትኹረቱ ካብ ዋትን ናብ ውጽኢት ሉመንን ርሒቑ ይሰጋገር ኣሎ፣ ነቲ ዓዳጊ ብቐጥታ ዝትግበር መሰረት ንምሃብ ላምባ ዝመርጽሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ ለውጢ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ኣተኩሮ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ድምቀት ኣለዎ?

passage: Alison Jing Xu, assistant professor of management at the University of Toronto Scarborough and Aparna Labroo of Northwestern University conducted a series of studies analyzing the correlation between lighting and human emotion. The researchers asked participants to rate a number of things such as: the spiciness of chicken-wing sauce, the aggressiveness of a fictional character, how attractive someone was, their feelings about specific words, and the taste of two juices–all under different lighting conditions. In their study, they found that both positive and negative human emotions are felt more intensely in bright light. Professor Xu stated, 'we found that on sunny days depression-prone people actually become more depressed.' They also found that dim light makes people make more rational decisions and settle negotiations easier. In the dark, emotions are slightly suppressed. However, emotions are intensified in the bright light.
question: Who conducted the studies on the correlation between lighting and human emotion?
mc_answer1: Alison Jing Xu and Aparna Labroo
translated_passage: ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ቶሮንቶ ስካርቦሮ ተሓጋጋዚት ፕሮፌሰር ምሕደራ ኣሊሰን ጂንግ ዙን ኣፓርና ላብሩን ካብ ኖርዝዌስተርን ዩኒቨርሲቲን ኣብ መንጎ መብራህትን ስምዒት ደቂ ሰባትን ዘሎ ምትእስሳር ዝትንትን ተኸታታሊ መፅናዕትታት ኣካይዳ። እቶም ተመራመርቲ ንተሳተፍቲ ንሓያሎ ነገራት ከም: ቀመምነት ናይ ደርሆ-ዊንግ ሶስ: ምጥቃዕ ናይ ሓደ ልብወለዳዊ ገጸ ባህሪ: ሓደ ሰብ ክንደይ ሰሓቢ እዩ: ብዛዕባ ፍሉይ ቃላት ዝነበሮም ስምዒታትን ጣዕሙ ክልተ ጽማቝን–ኩሉ ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ኩነታት ብርሃን ኺህቡ ሓቲቶም። ኣብ መጽናዕቶም፡ ኣወንታዊን ኣሉታውን ስምዒታት ደቂ ሰባት ብድሙቕ ብርሃን ዝያዳ ከም ዝስመዓካ ረኺቦም። ፕሮፌሰር ዙ፡ 'ኣብ ጸሓያዊ መዓልታት ንጭንቀት ዝቃልዑ ሰባት ብሓቂ ዝያዳ ጭንቀት ከም ዝስምዖም ረኺብናዮ። ዲም ላይት ንሰባት ዝያዳ ርትዓዊ ውሳነታት ከም ዝወስዱን ድርድር ከም ዝቐለለን እውን ረኺቦም። ኣብ ጸልማት ስምዒታት ቁሩብ ይዕፈን። ይኹን እምበር፡ ስምዒታት ኣብቲ ድሙቕ ብርሃን ይሕይል።
translated_question: ኣብ መንጎ መብራህትን ስምዒት ደቂ ሰባትን ዘሎ ምትእስሳር መን እዩ ዘካየዶ?

The researchers asked participants to rate a number of things such as: the spiciness of chicken-wing sauce, the aggressiveness of a fictional character, how attractive someone was, their feelings about specific words, and the taste of two juices–all under different lighting conditions. In their study, they found that both positive and negative human emotions are felt more intensely in bright light. Professor Xu stated, 'we found that on sunny days depression-prone people actually become more depressed.' They also found that dim light makes people make more rational decisions and settle negotiations easier. In the dark, emotions are slightly suppressed. translated_mc_answer2: ቀመምነት ናይ ደርሆ-ክንፊ ሶስ, ምጥቃዕ ናይ ሓደ ገጸ ባህሪ, ስሕበት, ስምዒታት ብዛዕባ ቃላት, ከምኡውን ጣዕሚ ጽማቝ

passage: Alison Jing Xu, assistant professor of management at the University of Toronto Scarborough and Aparna Labroo of Northwestern University conducted a series of studies analyzing the correlation between lighting and human emotion. The researchers asked participants to rate a number of things such as: the spiciness of chicken-wing sauce, the aggressiveness of a fictional character, how attractive someone was, their feelings about specific words, and the taste of two juices–all under different lighting conditions. In their study, they found that both positive and negative human emotions are felt more intensely in bright light. Professor Xu stated, 'we found that on sunny days depression-prone people actually become more depressed.' They also found that dim light makes people make more rational decisions and settle negotiations easier. In the dark, emotions are slightly suppressed. However, emotions are intensified in the bright light.
question: According to the passage, what effect does bright light have on human emotions?
mc_answer2: It makes emotions feel more intense
translated_passage: ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ቶሮንቶ ስካርቦሮ ተሓጋጋዚት ፕሮፌሰር ምሕደራ ኣሊሰን ጂንግ ዙን ኣፓርና ላብሩን ካብ ኖርዝዌስተርን ዩኒቨርሲቲን ኣብ መንጎ መብራህትን ስምዒት ደቂ ሰባትን ዘሎ ምትእስሳር ዝትንትን ተኸታታሊ መፅናዕትታት ኣካይዳ። እቶም ተመራመርቲ ንተሳተፍቲ ንሓያሎ ነገራት ከም: ቀመምነት ናይ ደርሆ-ዊንግ ሶስ: ምጥቃዕ ናይ ሓደ ልብወለዳዊ ገጸ ባህሪ: ሓደ ሰብ ክንደይ ሰሓቢ እዩ: ብዛዕባ ፍሉይ ቃላት ዝነበሮም ስምዒታትን ጣዕሙ ክልተ ጽማቝን–ኩሉ ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ኩነታት ብርሃን ኺህቡ ሓቲቶም። ኣብ መጽናዕቶም፡ ኣወንታዊን ኣሉታውን ስምዒታት ደቂ ሰባት ብድሙቕ ብርሃን ዝያዳ ከም ዝስመዓካ ረኺቦም። ፕሮፌሰር ዙ፡ 'ኣብ ጸሓያዊ መዓልታት ንጭንቀት ዝቃልዑ ሰባት ብሓቂ ዝያዳ ጭንቀት ከም ዝስምዖም ረኺብናዮ። ዲም ላይት ንሰባት ዝያዳ ርትዓዊ ውሳነታት ከም ዝወስዱን ድርድር ከም ዝቐለለን እውን ረኺቦም። ኣብ ጸልማት ስምዒታት ቁሩብ ይዕፈን። ይኹን እምበር፡ ስምዒታት ኣብቲ ድሙቕ ብርሃን ይሕይል።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ድሙቕ ብርሃን ኣብ ስምዒታት ደቂ ሰባት እንታይ ጽልዋ ኣለዎ?
translated_mc_answer2: ስምዒታት ዝያዳ ጽዑቕ ስምዒት ከም ዝስምዖም ይገብር ።

passage: The Professional Lighting And Sound Association (PLASA) is a UK-based trade organisation representing the 500+ individual and corporate members drawn from the technical services sector. Its members include manufacturers and distributors of stage and entertainment lighting, sound, rigging and similar products and services, and affiliated professionals in the area. They lobby for and represent the interests of the industry at various levels, interacting with government and regulating bodies and presenting the case for the entertainment industry. Example subjects of this representation include the ongoing review of radio frequencies (which may or may not affect the radio bands in which wireless microphones and other devices use) and engaging with the issues surrounding the introduction of the RoHS (Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive) regulations.
question: What is the main focus of PLASA as described in the passage?
mc_answer2: Representing the technical services sector including stage and entertainment lighting, sound, and rigging
translated_passage: ማሕበር ሞያዊ መብራህትን ድምጽን (PLASA) ኣብ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ዝመደበሩ ካብ ጽላት ቴክኒካዊ ኣገልግሎት ዝተሳእለ 500+ ውልቃውን ትካላትን ኣባላት ዝውክል ትካል ንግዲ እዩ። ኣባላቱ ድማ ኣፍረይትን ኣከፋፈልትን ናይ መድረኽን መዘናግዕን መብራህትን መዘናግዕን፣ ድምፂ፣ ሪጊንግን ተመሳሳሊ ፍርያትን ኣገልግሎታትን፣ ከምኡ እውን ኣብቲ ከባቢ ዝተኣሳሰሩ ሰብ ሞያን ይርከብዎም። ንረብሓታት እቲ ኢንዱስትሪ ብዝተፈላለየ ደረጃታት ይጉስጉሱን ይውክሉን፣ ምስ መንግስቲ ብምትሕብባርን ኣካላት ምቁፅፃርን ንመዘናግዒ ኢንዱስትሪ ዝኸውን ጉዳይ የቕርቡን። ኣብነት ዝኾኑ ኣርእስታት ናይዚ ውክልና፡ ቀጻሊ ዳግመ-ግምት ናይ ሬድዮ ፍሪኩዌንሲታት (እዚ ድማ ነቲ ገመድ ኣልቦ ማይክሮፎናትን ካልኦት መሳርሒታትን ዝጥቀሙሉ ናይ ሬድዮ ባንድታት ክጸልዉ ይኽእሉ ወይ ዘይክጸልዉ ይኽእሉ) ከምኡ’ውን ምስቶም ምትእትታው ROHS (Restrition መምርሒ ሓደገኛ ንጥረ ነገራት) ዝምልከት ጉዳያት ምውፋር ይርከብዎም።
translated_question: ከምቲ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተገልጸ ቀንዲ ትኹረት ፕላሳ እንታይ እዩ?
translated_mc_answer2: ንመድረኽን መዘናግዕን ዝኸውን መብራህቲ፣ ድምፂን ሪጊንግን ሓዊሱ ንዘፈር ቴክኒካዊ ኣገልግሎት ዝውክል

passage: The Professional Lighting And Sound Association (PLASA) is a UK-based trade organisation representing the 500+ individual and corporate members drawn from the technical services sector. Its members include manufacturers and distributors of stage and entertainment lighting, sound, rigging and similar products and services, and affiliated professionals in the area. They lobby for and represent the interests of the industry at various levels, interacting with government and regulating bodies and presenting the case for the entertainment industry. Example subjects of this representation include the ongoing review of radio frequencies (which may or may not affect the radio bands in which wireless microphones and other devices use) and engaging with the issues surrounding the introduction of the RoHS (Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive) regulations.

passage: Specification of illumination requirements is the basic concept of deciding how much illumination is required for a given task. Clearly, much less light is required to illuminate a hallway compared to that needed for a word processing work station. Generally speaking, the energy expended is proportional to the design illumination level. For example, a lighting level of 400 lux might be chosen for a work environment involving meeting rooms and conferences, whereas a level of 80 lux could be selected for building hallways. If the hallway standard simply emulates the conference room needs, then much more energy will be consumed than is needed. Unfortunately, most of the lighting standards even today have been specified by industrial groups who manufacture and sell lighting, so that a historical commercial bias exists in designing most building lighting, especially for office and industrial settings.
question: What is the basic concept described in the passage?
translated_passage: ስፔሲፊኬሽን ናይ ምብራህ ጠለባት ንዝተዋህበ ዕማም ክንደይ ዝኣክል ብርሃን ከምዘድሊ ምውሳን መሰረታዊ ኣምር እዩ። ብንጹር፡ ምስቲ ንናይ ቃላት ምምስራሕ ስራሕ መደበር ዘድሊ ክነጻጸር እንከሎ፡ ንሓደ ኮሪደር ንምብራህ ኣዝዩ ዝወሓደ ብርሃን ከም ዘድሊ ንጹር እዩ። ብሓፈሻ እቲ ዝወጽእ ጸዓት ምስቲ ናይ ዲዛይን ብርሃን ደረጃ ተመጣጣኒ እዩ። ንኣብነት ናይ 400 ሉክስ ደረጃ መብራህቲ ንናይ ኣኼባ ክፍልታትን ዋዕላታትን ዘካተተ ናይ ስራሕ ሃዋህው ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ፣ ንህንጻዊ ኮሪደራት ዝኸውን 80 ሉክስ ደረጃ 80 ሉክስ ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ። እቲ ናይ ኮሪደር ደረጃ ንዘድልዮ ናይ ዋዕላ ክፍሊ ጥራይ እንተመሲሉ፡ ሽዑ ካብቲ ዘድሊ ኣዝዩ ዝያዳ ጸዓት ክውድእ እዩ። እቲ ዘሕዝን ግን መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ብርሃን ደረጃታት ሎሚ እውን እንተኾነ ብኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ብርሃን ዘፍርያን ዝሸጣን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ዝተገለፀ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ምእንቲ ብፍላይ ንመብዛሕትኡ ናይ ህንጻ መብራህቲ ኣብ ምሕንጻጽ ታሪኻዊ ንግዳዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻት ብፍላይ ንቤት ጽሕፈትን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ምድላዋትን ክህሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተገልጸ መሰረታዊ ኣምር እንታይ እዩ?

translated_passage: ስፔሲፊኬሽን ናይ ምብራህ ጠለባት ንዝተዋህበ ዕማም ክንደይ ዝኣክል ብርሃን ከምዘድሊ ምውሳን መሰረታዊ ኣምር እዩ። ብንጹር፡ ምስቲ ንናይ ቃላት ምምስራሕ ስራሕ መደበር ዘድሊ ክነጻጸር እንከሎ፡ ንሓደ ኮሪደር ንምብራህ ኣዝዩ ዝወሓደ ብርሃን ከም ዘድሊ ንጹር እዩ። ብሓፈሻ እቲ ዝወጽእ ጸዓት ምስቲ ናይ ዲዛይን ብርሃን ደረጃ ተመጣጣኒ እዩ። ንኣብነት ናይ 400 ሉክስ ደረጃ መብራህቲ ንናይ ኣኼባ ክፍልታትን ዋዕላታትን ዘካተተ ናይ ስራሕ ሃዋህው ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ፣ ንህንጻዊ ኮሪደራት ዝኸውን 80 ሉክስ ደረጃ 80 ሉክስ ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ። እቲ ናይ ኮሪደር ደረጃ ንዘድልዮ ናይ ዋዕላ ክፍሊ ጥራይ እንተመሲሉ፡ ሽዑ ካብቲ ዘድሊ ኣዝዩ ዝያዳ ጸዓት ክውድእ እዩ። እቲ ዘሕዝን ግን መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ብርሃን ደረጃታት ሎሚ እውን እንተኾነ ብኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ብርሃን ዘፍርያን ዝሸጣን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ዝተገለፀ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ምእንቲ ብፍላይ ንመብዛሕትኡ ናይ ህንጻ መብራህቲ ኣብ ምሕንጻጽ ታሪኻዊ ንግዳዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻት ብፍላይ ንቤት ጽሕፈትን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ምድላዋትን ክህሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ዕማም እዩ ብመሰረት እቲ መሕለፊ ኣዝዩ ዝወሓደ ብርሃን ዝሓትት?
translated_mc_answer1: ንሓደ ቃላት ምምስራሕ ዝሰርሕ መደበር ስራሕ ምብራህ

passage: Specification of illumination requirements is the basic concept of deciding how much illumination is required for a given task. Clearly, much less light is required to illuminate a hallway compared to that needed for a word processing work station. Generally speaking, the energy expended is proportional to the design illumination level. For example, a lighting level of 400 lux might be chosen for a work environment involving meeting rooms and conferences, whereas a level of 80 lux could be selected for building hallways. If the hallway standard simply emulates the conference room needs, then much more energy will be consumed than is needed. Unfortunately, most of the lighting standards even today have been specified by industrial groups who manufacture and sell lighting, so that a historical commercial bias exists in designing most building lighting, especially for office and industrial settings.
question: How is the energy expended related to the design illumination level?

mc_answer2: It leads to unnecessary energy consumption
translated_passage: ስፔሲፊኬሽን ናይ ምብራህ ጠለባት ንዝተዋህበ ዕማም ክንደይ ዝኣክል ብርሃን ከምዘድሊ ምውሳን መሰረታዊ ኣምር እዩ። ብንጹር፡ ምስቲ ንናይ ቃላት ምምስራሕ ስራሕ መደበር ዘድሊ ክነጻጸር እንከሎ፡ ንሓደ ኮሪደር ንምብራህ ኣዝዩ ዝወሓደ ብርሃን ከም ዘድሊ ንጹር እዩ። ብሓፈሻ እቲ ዝወጽእ ጸዓት ምስቲ ናይ ዲዛይን ብርሃን ደረጃ ተመጣጣኒ እዩ። ንኣብነት ናይ 400 ሉክስ ደረጃ መብራህቲ ንናይ ኣኼባ ክፍልታትን ዋዕላታትን ዘካተተ ናይ ስራሕ ሃዋህው ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ፣ ንህንጻዊ ኮሪደራት ዝኸውን 80 ሉክስ ደረጃ 80 ሉክስ ክምረጽ ይኽእል እዩ። እቲ ናይ ኮሪደር ደረጃ ንዘድልዮ ናይ ዋዕላ ክፍሊ ጥራይ እንተመሲሉ፡ ሽዑ ካብቲ ዘድሊ ኣዝዩ ዝያዳ ጸዓት ክውድእ እዩ። እቲ ዘሕዝን ግን መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ብርሃን ደረጃታት ሎሚ እውን እንተኾነ ብኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ብርሃን ዘፍርያን ዝሸጣን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ጉጅለታት ዝተገለፀ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ምእንቲ ብፍላይ ንመብዛሕትኡ ናይ ህንጻ መብራህቲ ኣብ ምሕንጻጽ ታሪኻዊ ንግዳዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻዊ ሸነኻት ብፍላይ ንቤት ጽሕፈትን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ምድላዋትን ክህሉ እዩ።
translated_question: ንመተሓላለፊታት ዝኸውን ናይ ዋዕላ ክፍሊ መብራህቲ ደረጃታት ምጥቃም እንታይ ሳዕቤን ኣለዎ?

passage: Specification of illumination requirements is the basic concept of deciding how much illumination is required for a given task. Clearly, much less light is required to illuminate a hallway compared to that needed for a word processing work station. Generally speaking, the energy expended is proportional to the design illumination level. For example, a lighting level of 400 lux might be chosen for a work environment involving meeting rooms and conferences, whereas a level of 80 lux could be selected for building hallways. If the hallway standard simply emulates the conference room needs, then much more energy will be consumed than is needed. Unfortunately, most of the lighting standards even today have been specified by industrial groups who manufacture and sell lighting, so that a historical commercial bias exists in designing most building lighting, especially for office and industrial settings.
question: Who has primarily specified most lighting standards mentioned in the passage?
mc_answer3: Industrial groups that manufacture and sell lighting

passage: Marshall's words and future court decisions gave Congress much latitude in delegating powers. It was not until the 1930s that the Supreme Court held a delegation of authority unconstitutional. In a case involving the creation of the National Recovery Administration called A.L.A. Schechter Poultry Corp. v. United States, 295 U.S. 495 (1935), Congress could not authorize the president to formulate codes of 'fair competition.' It was held that Congress must set some standards governing the actions of executive officers. The Court, however, has deemed that phrases such as 'just and reasonable,' 'public interest' and 'public convenience' suffice.
question: What contributed to Congress having broad latitude in delegating powers according to the passage?
mc_answer1: Marshall's words and future court decisions
mc_answer3: The actions of the National Recovery Administration
translated_passage: ቃላት ማርሻልን ናይ መጻኢ ውሳኔታት ቤት ፍርድን ንኮንግረስ ኣብ ምውቃዕ ስልጣን ብዙሕ ላቲቱድ ሂብዎ። ላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ልኡኽ ስልጣን ዘይቅዋማዊ ዝኾነ ልኡኽ ዝሃበ ክሳብ 1930ታት እዩ ነይሩ። ኣብ ምፍጣር ሃገራዊ ምምሕዳር ሕውየት ኣብ ዘካተተ ጉዳይ A.L.A. ሸክተር ፖልትሪ ኮርፐሬሽን ኣንጻር ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ 295 U.S. 495 (1935)፡ ኮንግረስ ንፕረዚደንት 'ፍትሓዊ ውድድር' ዝምልከት ሕግታት ንኽሕንጽጽ ስልጣን ክህቦ ኣይከኣለን። ኮንግረስ ንተግባራት ፈጸምቲ ስራሕ ዝምልከት ገለ መዐቀኒታት ከቐምጥ ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ። እቲ ቤት ፍርዲ ግን፡ ከም ‘ፍትሓውን ርትዓውን’ ዝኣመሰሉ ሓረጋት ከም ‘ህዝባዊ ረብሓ’ን ‘ህዝባዊ ምቹእነት’ን ዝኣመሰሉ ሓረጋት ከም ዝኣኽሎም ገይርዎም ኣሎ።
translated_question: ኮንግረስ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ስልጣን ኣብ ምውፋይ ሰፊሕ ላቲቱድ ንኽህልዎ እንታይ ኣበርክቶ ገይሩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ናይ ማርሻል ቃላትን ናይ መጻኢ ውሳነ ቤት ፍርድን

mc_answer1: They restricted Congress from delegating any powers
mc_answer2: They granted Congress significant latitude in delegating powers
mc_answer3: They forced Congress to centralize power in the executive branch
mc_answer4: They eliminated Congress's ability to legislate
translated_passage: ቃላት ማርሻልን ናይ መጻኢ ውሳኔታት ቤት ፍርድን ንኮንግረስ ኣብ ምውቃዕ ስልጣን ብዙሕ ላቲቱድ ሂብዎ። ላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ልኡኽ ስልጣን ዘይቅዋማዊ ዝኾነ ልኡኽ ዝሃበ ክሳብ 1930ታት እዩ ነይሩ። ኣብ ምፍጣር ሃገራዊ ምምሕዳር ሕውየት ኣብ ዘካተተ ጉዳይ A.L.A. ሸክተር ፖልትሪ ኮርፐሬሽን ኣንጻር ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ 295 U.S. 495 (1935)፡ ኮንግረስ ንፕረዚደንት 'ፍትሓዊ ውድድር' ዝምልከት ሕግታት ንኽሕንጽጽ ስልጣን ክህቦ ኣይከኣለን። ኮንግረስ ንተግባራት ፈጸምቲ ስራሕ ዝምልከት ገለ መዐቀኒታት ከቐምጥ ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ። እቲ ቤት ፍርዲ ግን፡ ከም ‘ፍትሓውን ርትዓውን’ ዝኣመሰሉ ሓረጋት ከም ‘ህዝባዊ ረብሓ’ን ‘ህዝባዊ ምቹእነት’ን ዝኣመሰሉ ሓረጋት ከም ዝኣኽሎም ገይርዎም ኣሎ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ቃላት ማርሻልን ስዒቡ ዝመጸ ውሳነታት ቤት ፍርድን ኣብ መወዳእታ ንኮንግረስ እንታይ እዩ ዝብል?
translated_mc_answer1: ንኮንግረስ ዝኾነ ይኹን ስልጣን ካብ ምውፋይ ገዲቦምዎ ።
translated_mc_answer2: ንሳቶም ንኮንግረስ ኣብ ምውቃዕ ስልጣን ርኡይ ላቲቱድ ፈቒዶም
translated_mc_answer3: ንኮንግረስ ኣብ ፈጻሚት ስራሕ ስልጣን ከእቱ ኣገዲዶም

passage: The first six presidents of the United States did not make extensive use of the veto power: George Washington only vetoed two bills, James Monroe one, and John Adams, Thomas Jefferson and John Quincy Adams none. James Madison, a firm believer in a strong executive, vetoed seven bills. None of the first six Presidents, however, used the veto to direct national policy. It was Andrew Jackson, the seventh President, who was the first to use the veto as a political weapon. During his two terms in office, he vetoed twelve bills—more than all of his predecessors combined. Furthermore, he defied the Supreme Court in enforcing the policy of ethnically cleansing Native American tribes ('Indian Removal'); he stated (perhaps apocryphally), 'John Marshall has made his decision. Now let him enforce it!'
question: How many bills did George Washington veto according to the passage?
translated_passage: እቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ኣመሪካ ነቲ ናይ ቬቶ ስልጣን ብሰፊሑ ኣይተጠቐምሉን: ጆርጅ ዋሽንግተን ክልተ ሕሳባት ጥራይ ቬቶ ኣውጺኡ፣ ጀምስ ሞንሮ ዋን: ከምኡውን ጆን ኣዳምስ፣ ቶማስ ጀፈርሰንን ጆን ኲንሲ ኣዳምስን ዝኾነ ይኹን። ጀምስ ማዲሰን፡ ኣብ ሓደ ሓያል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ጽኑዕ ኣማኒ፡ 7 እማመታት ብቬቶ ኣውጺኡ። ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ግን ዋላ ሓደ’ውን ነቲ ቬቶ ንሃገራዊ ፖሊሲ ንምምራሕ ተጠቒሙ። ንቬቶ ከም ፖለቲካዊ ኣጽዋር ዝጥቀመሉ ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርታ ዝነበረ ሻብዓይ ፕረዚደንት ኣንድሪው ጃክሰን እዩ። ኣብ ቤት ጽሕፈት ኣብ ዝገበሮ ክልተ ግዜ፡ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ሕሳባት ቬቶ ኣውጽአ- ካብ ኩሎም እቶም ቅድሚኡ ዝነበሩ ተደሚሮም ንላዕሊ። ካብዚ ብተወሳኺ ንላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ኣብ ምትግባር ፖሊሲ ብብሄር ምጽራይ ቀቢላታት ደቀባት ኣሜሪካ ('ውላድ ምእላይ ህንዲ') ኣብ ምትግባር ኣቋሪፁ፤ ንሱ ገሊጹ (ምናልባት ብኣፖክሪፋሊ)፡ 'ጆን ማርሻል ውሳነኡ ወሰነ። ሕጂ ከተግብርዎ ይፍቀደሉ!'
translated_question: ጆርጅ ዋሽንግተን ቬቶ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ክንደይ ቢልስ እዩ ነይሩ?

translated_passage: እቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ኣመሪካ ነቲ ናይ ቬቶ ስልጣን ብሰፊሑ ኣይተጠቐምሉን: ጆርጅ ዋሽንግተን ክልተ ሕሳባት ጥራይ ቬቶ ኣውጺኡ፣ ጀምስ ሞንሮ ዋን: ከምኡውን ጆን ኣዳምስ፣ ቶማስ ጀፈርሰንን ጆን ኲንሲ ኣዳምስን ዝኾነ ይኹን። ጀምስ ማዲሰን፡ ኣብ ሓደ ሓያል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ጽኑዕ ኣማኒ፡ 7 እማመታት ብቬቶ ኣውጺኡ። ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ግን ዋላ ሓደ’ውን ነቲ ቬቶ ንሃገራዊ ፖሊሲ ንምምራሕ ተጠቒሙ። ንቬቶ ከም ፖለቲካዊ ኣጽዋር ዝጥቀመሉ ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርታ ዝነበረ ሻብዓይ ፕረዚደንት ኣንድሪው ጃክሰን እዩ። ኣብ ቤት ጽሕፈት ኣብ ዝገበሮ ክልተ ግዜ፡ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ሕሳባት ቬቶ ኣውጽአ- ካብ ኩሎም እቶም ቅድሚኡ ዝነበሩ ተደሚሮም ንላዕሊ። ካብዚ ብተወሳኺ ንላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ኣብ ምትግባር ፖሊሲ ብብሄር ምጽራይ ቀቢላታት ደቀባት ኣሜሪካ ('ውላድ ምእላይ ህንዲ') ኣብ ምትግባር ኣቋሪፁ፤ ንሱ ገሊጹ (ምናልባት ብኣፖክሪፋሊ)፡ 'ጆን ማርሻል ውሳነኡ ወሰነ። ሕጂ ከተግብርዎ ይፍቀደሉ!'
translated_question: ንቬቶ ከም ፖለቲካዊ ኣጽዋር ዝጥቀመላ ናይ መጀመርታ ፕረዚደንት መን እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: The first six presidents of the United States did not make extensive use of the veto power: George Washington only vetoed two bills, James Monroe one, and John Adams, Thomas Jefferson and John Quincy Adams none. James Madison, a firm believer in a strong executive, vetoed seven bills. None of the first six Presidents, however, used the veto to direct national policy. It was Andrew Jackson, the seventh President, who was the first to use the veto as a political weapon. During his two terms in office, he vetoed twelve bills—more than all of his predecessors combined. Furthermore, he defied the Supreme Court in enforcing the policy of ethnically cleansing Native American tribes ('Indian Removal'); he stated (perhaps apocryphally), 'John Marshall has made his decision. Now let him enforce it!'
question: How many bills did Andrew Jackson veto during his two terms in office?

translated_passage: እቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ኣመሪካ ነቲ ናይ ቬቶ ስልጣን ብሰፊሑ ኣይተጠቐምሉን: ጆርጅ ዋሽንግተን ክልተ ሕሳባት ጥራይ ቬቶ ኣውጺኡ፣ ጀምስ ሞንሮ ዋን: ከምኡውን ጆን ኣዳምስ፣ ቶማስ ጀፈርሰንን ጆን ኲንሲ ኣዳምስን ዝኾነ ይኹን። ጀምስ ማዲሰን፡ ኣብ ሓደ ሓያል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ጽኑዕ ኣማኒ፡ 7 እማመታት ብቬቶ ኣውጺኡ። ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ሽዱሽተ ፕረዚደንታት ግን ዋላ ሓደ’ውን ነቲ ቬቶ ንሃገራዊ ፖሊሲ ንምምራሕ ተጠቒሙ። ንቬቶ ከም ፖለቲካዊ ኣጽዋር ዝጥቀመሉ ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርታ ዝነበረ ሻብዓይ ፕረዚደንት ኣንድሪው ጃክሰን እዩ። ኣብ ቤት ጽሕፈት ኣብ ዝገበሮ ክልተ ግዜ፡ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ሕሳባት ቬቶ ኣውጽአ- ካብ ኩሎም እቶም ቅድሚኡ ዝነበሩ ተደሚሮም ንላዕሊ። ካብዚ ብተወሳኺ ንላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ኣብ ምትግባር ፖሊሲ ብብሄር ምጽራይ ቀቢላታት ደቀባት ኣሜሪካ ('ውላድ ምእላይ ህንዲ') ኣብ ምትግባር ኣቋሪፁ፤ ንሱ ገሊጹ (ምናልባት ብኣፖክሪፋሊ)፡ 'ጆን ማርሻል ውሳነኡ ወሰነ። ሕጂ ከተግብርዎ ይፍቀደሉ!'
translated_question: ንኣንድሪው ጃክሰን ብዛዕባ ምትግባር ውሳነ ላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ እንታይ መግለጺ እዩ ዝምዘን?
translated_mc_answer2: ጆን ማርሻል ውሳነኡ ሂቡ ኣሎ። ሕጂ ከተግብርዎ ንግበር!
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ውሳነ ናይ መወዳእታ ኮይኑ ክእዘዝ ኣለዎ .

passage: In Renaissance Europe, from about 1400 onwards, there was a revival of Classical learning accompanied by the development of Renaissance Humanism which placed greater emphasis on the role of the individual in society than had been the case during the Medieval period. Buildings were ascribed to specific architects – Brunelleschi, Alberti, Michelangelo, Palladio – and the cult of the individual had begun. There was still no dividing line between artist, architect and engineer, or any of the related vocations, and the appellation was often one of regional preference.
question: What revival took place in Renaissance Europe from about 1400 onwards?
translated_passage: ኣብ ህዳሴ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ኣስታት 1400 ንደሓር፡ ብልምዓት ናይ ህዳሴ ሰብኣውነት ዝተሰነየ ናይ ክላሲካል ትምህርቲ ትንሳኤ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ኣብ እዋን ማእከላይ ዘመን ዝነበረ ንላዕሊ፡ ኣብ ተራ ውልቀሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ዝገበረ እዩ። ህንጻታት ንፍሉያት ኣርኪተክተራት - ብሩነለስኪ፡ ኣልበርቲ፡ ሚካኤላንጀሎ፡ ፓላድዮ - ተመዝጊቦም ነይሮም፡ ኣምልኾ ናይቲ ውልቀሰብ ድማ ተጀመረ። ኣብ መንጎ ስነጥበባዊ፡ ኣርኪቴክትን መሃንድስን፡ ወይ ዝኾነ ካብቶም ተዛመድቲ ጸዋዕታታት ገና ናይ ምምቕቓል መስመር ኣይነበረን፡ እቲ መጸውዒ ድማ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ካብ ዞባዊ ምርጫ ሓደ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ህዳሴ ኤውሮጳ ካብ 1400 ጀሚሩ እንታይ ትንሳኤ ተኻይዱ?

mc_answer4: They were separated by professional guilds
translated_passage: ኣብ ህዳሴ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ኣስታት 1400 ንደሓር፡ ብልምዓት ናይ ህዳሴ ሰብኣውነት ዝተሰነየ ናይ ክላሲካል ትምህርቲ ትንሳኤ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ኣብ እዋን ማእከላይ ዘመን ዝነበረ ንላዕሊ፡ ኣብ ተራ ውልቀሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ዝገበረ እዩ። ህንጻታት ንፍሉያት ኣርኪተክተራት - ብሩነለስኪ፡ ኣልበርቲ፡ ሚካኤላንጀሎ፡ ፓላድዮ - ተመዝጊቦም ነይሮም፡ ኣምልኾ ናይቲ ውልቀሰብ ድማ ተጀመረ። ኣብ መንጎ ስነጥበባዊ፡ ኣርኪቴክትን መሃንድስን፡ ወይ ዝኾነ ካብቶም ተዛመድቲ ጸዋዕታታት ገና ናይ ምምቕቓል መስመር ኣይነበረን፡ እቲ መጸውዒ ድማ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ካብ ዞባዊ ምርጫ ሓደ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ጸዋዕታ ስነ-ጥበባዊ፡ ኣርኪተክተርን መሃንድስን ኣብ እዋን ህዳሴ ብኸመይ ተፈልዩ ነይሩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ብጽኑዕ ትምህርታዊ ጠለባት ብንጹር ዝተነጸሩ ’ ዮም።
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ መንጎ እዞም ጸዋዕታታት ዝኾነ ናይ ምምቕቓል መስመር ኣይነበረን።

passage: In Renaissance Europe, from about 1400 onwards, there was a revival of Classical learning accompanied by the development of Renaissance Humanism which placed greater emphasis on the role of the individual in society than had been the case during the Medieval period. Buildings were ascribed to specific architects – Brunelleschi, Alberti, Michelangelo, Palladio – and the cult of the individual had begun. There was still no dividing line between artist, architect and engineer, or any of the related vocations, and the appellation was often one of regional preference.
question: What term in the passage signifies the emerging focus on the individual during the Renaissance?
translated_passage: ኣብ ህዳሴ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ኣስታት 1400 ንደሓር፡ ብልምዓት ናይ ህዳሴ ሰብኣውነት ዝተሰነየ ናይ ክላሲካል ትምህርቲ ትንሳኤ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ኣብ እዋን ማእከላይ ዘመን ዝነበረ ንላዕሊ፡ ኣብ ተራ ውልቀሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ዝገበረ እዩ። ህንጻታት ንፍሉያት ኣርኪተክተራት - ብሩነለስኪ፡ ኣልበርቲ፡ ሚካኤላንጀሎ፡ ፓላድዮ - ተመዝጊቦም ነይሮም፡ ኣምልኾ ናይቲ ውልቀሰብ ድማ ተጀመረ። ኣብ መንጎ ስነጥበባዊ፡ ኣርኪቴክትን መሃንድስን፡ ወይ ዝኾነ ካብቶም ተዛመድቲ ጸዋዕታታት ገና ናይ ምምቕቓል መስመር ኣይነበረን፡ እቲ መጸውዒ ድማ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ካብ ዞባዊ ምርጫ ሓደ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ ቃል እዩ ነቲ ኣብ እዋን ህዳሴ ኣብቲ ውልቀሰብ ዝግበር ትኹረት ዝግልበጥ ትኹረት ዘመልክት?

passage: In Renaissance Europe, from about 1400 onwards, there was a revival of Classical learning accompanied by the development of Renaissance Humanism which placed greater emphasis on the role of the individual in society than had been the case during the Medieval period. Buildings were ascribed to specific architects – Brunelleschi, Alberti, Michelangelo, Palladio – and the cult of the individual had begun. There was still no dividing line between artist, architect and engineer, or any of the related vocations, and the appellation was often one of regional preference.
question: How were titles such as artist, architect, and engineer typically determined during the Renaissance according to the passage?
mc_answer1: They were based on formal academic degrees
mc_answer2: They were designated by royal appointment
mc_answer3: They were often a matter of regional preference
mc_answer4: They were determined by religious authorities
translated_passage: ኣብ ህዳሴ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ኣስታት 1400 ንደሓር፡ ብልምዓት ናይ ህዳሴ ሰብኣውነት ዝተሰነየ ናይ ክላሲካል ትምህርቲ ትንሳኤ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ኣብ እዋን ማእከላይ ዘመን ዝነበረ ንላዕሊ፡ ኣብ ተራ ውልቀሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ ዝዓበየ ኣተኩሮ ዝገበረ እዩ። ህንጻታት ንፍሉያት ኣርኪተክተራት - ብሩነለስኪ፡ ኣልበርቲ፡ ሚካኤላንጀሎ፡ ፓላድዮ - ተመዝጊቦም ነይሮም፡ ኣምልኾ ናይቲ ውልቀሰብ ድማ ተጀመረ። ኣብ መንጎ ስነጥበባዊ፡ ኣርኪቴክትን መሃንድስን፡ ወይ ዝኾነ ካብቶም ተዛመድቲ ጸዋዕታታት ገና ናይ ምምቕቓል መስመር ኣይነበረን፡ እቲ መጸውዒ ድማ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ካብ ዞባዊ ምርጫ ሓደ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_question: ከም ኣርቲስትን ኣርኪቴክትን መሃንድስን ዝኣመሰሉ ኣርእስታት ብተለምዶ ኣብ እዋን ህዳሴ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ብኸመይ ይውሰን ነይሩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብ ወግዓዊ ኣካዳሚያዊ ዲግሪ ዝተመርኮሱ እዮም ነይሮም።
translated_mc_answer3: መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ናይ ዞባዊ ምርጫ ጉዳይ እዮም ነይሮም።

passage: Some countries were not included for various reasons, mainly the unavailability of certain crucial data. The following United Nations Member States were not included in the 2010 report. Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. The situation has been addressed and, in later years, Cuba has ranked as a High Human Development country.
question: What was the main reason some countries were not included in the 2010 report?
translated_passage: ገለ ሃገራት ብዝተፈላለየ ምኽንያት ኣይተኻተተን፣ ብቐንዱ ገለ ወሳኒ መረዳእታታት ዘይምህላው። እዘን ዝስዕባ ኣባላት ሃገራት ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ኣይተኻተታን። ኩባ ብዘይምሕባሩ ወግዓዊ ተቓውሞ ኣቕሪባ። UNDP ከም ዝገለጾ ኩባ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት \'ኣህጉራዊ ጸብጻብ ኣሃዝ ኩባ ንምዕዳግ ሓይሊ ምዕዳግ ዝተመዓራረየ ሓፈሻዊ ሃገራዊ እቶት ኩባ ካብ ስእነት ከምዘይተገለለ ገሊጽዋ። ኩሎም ካልኦት ንኩባ ዝሕብር መርኣዪታት ተረኺቦም፣ ብUNDP ድማ ይጽብጸቡ ነበሩ፣ ሓደ መርኣዪ ዘይምህላው ግን ዝኾነ ደረጃ ምስታ ሃገር ክምለስ ከምዘይክእል ዘመልክት እዩ። እቲ ኩነታት ተፈቲሑ፡ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ኩባ ድማ ልዑል ሰብኣዊ ምዕባለ ዘለዋ ሃገር ኮይና ተሰሪዓ ኣላ።
translated_question: ገለ ሃገራት ኣብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ዘይተኻተታሉ ቀንዲ ምኽንያት እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: Some countries were not included for various reasons, mainly the unavailability of certain crucial data. The following United Nations Member States were not included in the 2010 report. Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. The situation has been addressed and, in later years, Cuba has ranked as a High Human Development country.
question: Which country lodged a formal protest over its exclusion from the 2010 report?

translated_question: ካብ ጸብጻብ 2010 ዓ.ም.ፈ.

passage: Some countries were not included for various reasons, mainly the unavailability of certain crucial data. The following United Nations Member States were not included in the 2010 report. Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. question: Why was Cuba specifically excluded from the 2010 report?
mc_answer1: Because it did not report any data

mc_answer3: Because it was under economic sanctions
mc_answer4: Because of its low Human Development ranking
translated_passage: ገለ ሃገራት ብዝተፈላለየ ምኽንያት ኣይተኻተተን፣ ብቐንዱ ገለ ወሳኒ መረዳእታታት ዘይምህላው። እዘን ዝስዕባ ኣባላት ሃገራት ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ኣይተኻተታን። ኩባ ብዘይምሕባሩ ወግዓዊ ተቓውሞ ኣቕሪባ። UNDP ከም ዝገለጾ ኩባ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት \'ኣህጉራዊ ጸብጻብ ኣሃዝ ኩባ ንምዕዳግ ሓይሊ ምዕዳግ ዝተመዓራረየ ሓፈሻዊ ሃገራዊ እቶት ኩባ ካብ ስእነት ከምዘይተገለለ ገሊጽዋ። ኩሎም ካልኦት ንኩባ ዝሕብር መርኣዪታት ተረኺቦም፣ ብUNDP ድማ ይጽብጸቡ ነበሩ፣ ሓደ መርኣዪ ዘይምህላው ግን ዝኾነ ደረጃ ምስታ ሃገር ክምለስ ከምዘይክእል ዘመልክት እዩ። እቲ ኩነታት ተፈቲሑ፡ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ኩባ ድማ ልዑል ሰብኣዊ ምዕባለ ዘለዋ ሃገር ኮይና ተሰሪዓ ኣላ።
translated_question: ኩባ ብፍሉይ ካብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ተገሊላ?
translated_mc_answer2: ምኽንያቱ ንሓፈሻዊ ሃገራዊ ኣታዊኡ ብዓለምለኻዊ ደረጃ ጸብጻብ ስለ ዝጎደሎ ንፒፒፒ ዝተስተኻኸለ
translated_mc_answer3: ምኽንያቱ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቁጠባዊ እገዳ ስለ ዝነበረ .

passage: Some countries were not included for various reasons, mainly the unavailability of certain crucial data. The following United Nations Member States were not included in the 2010 report. Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. The situation has been addressed and, in later years, Cuba has ranked as a High Human Development country.
question: Were all indicators for Cuba unavailable according to the passage?
mc_answer2: No, only one crucial indicator was missing

translated_question: ኩሎም መርኣዪታት ንኩባ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ኣይተረኽቡን ነይሮም ድዮም?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣይፋልን ሓደ ወሳኒ መርኣዪ ጥራይ እዩ ዝጎደለ

Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. The situation has been addressed and, in later years, Cuba has ranked as a High Human Development country.
question: How is Cuba ranked in later years according to the passage?
translated_passage: ገለ ሃገራት ብዝተፈላለየ ምኽንያት ኣይተኻተተን፣ ብቐንዱ ገለ ወሳኒ መረዳእታታት ዘይምህላው። እዘን ዝስዕባ ኣባላት ሃገራት ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ኣይተኻተታን። ኩባ ብዘይምሕባሩ ወግዓዊ ተቓውሞ ኣቕሪባ። UNDP ከም ዝገለጾ ኩባ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት \'ኣህጉራዊ ጸብጻብ ኣሃዝ ኩባ ንምዕዳግ ሓይሊ ምዕዳግ ዝተመዓራረየ ሓፈሻዊ ሃገራዊ እቶት ኩባ ካብ ስእነት ከምዘይተገለለ ገሊጽዋ። ኩሎም ካልኦት ንኩባ ዝሕብር መርኣዪታት ተረኺቦም፣ ብUNDP ድማ ይጽብጸቡ ነበሩ፣ ሓደ መርኣዪ ዘይምህላው ግን ዝኾነ ደረጃ ምስታ ሃገር ክምለስ ከምዘይክእል ዘመልክት እዩ። እቲ ኩነታት ተፈቲሑ፡ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ኩባ ድማ ልዑል ሰብኣዊ ምዕባለ ዘለዋ ሃገር ኮይና ተሰሪዓ ኣላ።
translated_question: ኩባ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ከመይ ትስራዕ?

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What change occurred in the field of architecture since the 1980s?
mc_answer2: It became multi-disciplinary with specialized roles
mc_answer4: It reduced the number of involved professionals
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ ኣብ ዓውዲ ስነ ህንጻ ​​እንታይ ለውጢ ኣጋጢሙ?
translated_mc_answer2: ምስ ፍሉይ ተራ ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኮይኑ ።
translated_mc_answer4: ቁጽሪ ናይቶም ዝሳተፉ ሰብ ሞያ ኣጉዲሉ ።

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What increased separation in architectural roles is mentioned in the passage?
mc_answer2: Between digital and manual drafting experts
mc_answer3: Between the 'design' architect and the 'project' architect
mc_answer4: Between urban planners and landscape architects
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ኣብ ስነ ህንጻዊ ተራ ምፍልላይ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ እዩ ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ መንጎ ዲጂታላውን ማንዋልን ናይ ምንዳፍ ክኢላታት
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ከተማ ውጥንን መልክዓ ምድሪ ኣርኪቴክታትን

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: Which additional preparatory processes are now required in designing a large building?
mc_answer2: Preliminary studies of durability, sustainability, quality, cost, and legal compliance
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ሕጂ ኣየኖት ተወሳኺ መሰናድኦ መስርሕ ኣብ ምህዛን ዓቢ ህንጻ የድሊ?
translated_mc_answer2: መባእታዊ መጽናዕትታት ጽንዓት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ጽሬት፡ ወጻኢታትን ሕጋዊ ምኽባርን

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: According to the passage, what is now necessary for the design of a large structure?
mc_answer1: It can be designed by a single visionary
mc_answer2: It must be the work of a collaborative team
mc_answer3: It requires only the latest technology
mc_answer4: It relies solely on individual artistic talent
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ሕጂ ንዲዛይን ሓደ ዓቢ መዋቕር ኣድላዪ ዝኾነ ነገር ኣሎ?
translated_mc_answer1: ብሓደ ራእይ ዘለዎ ክነድፍ ይኽእል ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer2: ናይ ምትሕብባር ጋንታ ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ።
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ዝሓሸ ቴክኖሎጂ ጥራይ እዩ ዝሓትት ።
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ውልቃዊ ስነጥበባዊ ተውህቦ ጥራይ እዩ ዝምርኮስ ።

In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: How have Modernism and Postmodernism been criticised by some architects according to the passage?

mc_answer2: They are overly centered on personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuits by individualists
mc_answer3: They neglect the importance of historical preservation
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብኸመይ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ብገለ ኣርኪተክተራት ተነቒፉ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብ ምህዞ ቴክኖሎጂ ኣዝዮም ዘተኮሩ እዮም ።
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ ውልቃዊ፡ ፍልስፍናዊ፡ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ስራሓት ብውልቀ-ሰባት ዝማእከሉ እዮም
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ልዕሊ ጽሬት ምጉዳል ወጻኢታት የጉልሑ .

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What do some architects believe should inform the design process for creating liveable environments?
mc_answer2: Studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ገለ ኣርኪተክተራት ንመስርሕ ዲዛይን ንኽህሉ ዝኽእል ከባቢታት ንምፍጣር እንታይ ክሕብሩ ኣለዎም ዝብል እምነት ኣለዎም?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: What was the original intention behind the Crusades?
mc_answer1: To bring the Levant back into Christian rule
translated_passage: እቲ ብመስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝፍለጥ እዋን፡ ብተኸታታሊ ሃይማኖታዊ ድራኸ ዝለበሰ ወተሃደራዊ ወፍሪ፡ ፈለማ ንሌቫንት ናብ ክርስትያናዊ መግዛእቲ ንምምላስ ዝዓለመ፡ ተጀመረ። ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ማእከላይ ባሕሪ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ተመስሪቶም። እዚኦም ኩሎም ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮም እዮም። እቶም መስቀላውያን ኣብ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኤውሮጳ ዓሚቝ ጽልዋ ከሕድሩ እዮም። ኣብ 1204ንሳክ ናይ ቁስጥንጥንያኦም ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ኣካይዶም። ድሒሩ ዳግማይ ክምስረት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም ክብሩ ግን ፈጺሙ ኣይምመልአን። እቶም መስቀላውያን ናብ መንገዲ ስልክ ዝምዕብሉ ናይ ንግዲ መስመራት ይምስርቱን ንንግዳውያን ሪፓብሊካት ጀኖቫን ቬኒስን ዓበይቲ ቁጠባዊ ሓይልታት ንኽኾኑ መንገዲ ይኸፍቱን። እቲ ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ምንቅስቓስ ዝነበረ ረኮንኲስታ ንኢቤሪያ ንክርስቶስት ዳግማይ ንምስዓር ሰሪሑ።
translated_question: ድሕሪ መስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝነበረ መበቆላዊ ዕላማ እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: Where were several Crusader states founded according to the passage?
translated_passage: እቲ ብመስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝፍለጥ እዋን፡ ብተኸታታሊ ሃይማኖታዊ ድራኸ ዝለበሰ ወተሃደራዊ ወፍሪ፡ ፈለማ ንሌቫንት ናብ ክርስትያናዊ መግዛእቲ ንምምላስ ዝዓለመ፡ ተጀመረ። ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ማእከላይ ባሕሪ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ተመስሪቶም። እዚኦም ኩሎም ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮም እዮም። እቶም መስቀላውያን ኣብ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኤውሮጳ ዓሚቝ ጽልዋ ከሕድሩ እዮም። ኣብ 1204ንሳክ ናይ ቁስጥንጥንያኦም ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ኣካይዶም። ድሒሩ ዳግማይ ክምስረት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም ክብሩ ግን ፈጺሙ ኣይምመልአን። እቶም መስቀላውያን ናብ መንገዲ ስልክ ዝምዕብሉ ናይ ንግዲ መስመራት ይምስርቱን ንንግዳውያን ሪፓብሊካት ጀኖቫን ቬኒስን ዓበይቲ ቁጠባዊ ሓይልታት ንኽኾኑ መንገዲ ይኸፍቱን። እቲ ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ምንቅስቓስ ዝነበረ ረኮንኲስታ ንኢቤሪያ ንክርስቶስት ዳግማይ ንምስዓር ሰሪሑ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ኣበይ ተመስሪተን?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: Which event brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire?
mc_answer1: The founding of the Crusader states

translated_question: ኣየናይ ፍጻመ እዩ ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ዘብጽሐ?

translated_passage: እቲ ብመስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝፍለጥ እዋን፡ ብተኸታታሊ ሃይማኖታዊ ድራኸ ዝለበሰ ወተሃደራዊ ወፍሪ፡ ፈለማ ንሌቫንት ናብ ክርስትያናዊ መግዛእቲ ንምምላስ ዝዓለመ፡ ተጀመረ። ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ማእከላይ ባሕሪ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ተመስሪቶም። እዚኦም ኩሎም ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮም እዮም። እቶም መስቀላውያን ኣብ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኤውሮጳ ዓሚቝ ጽልዋ ከሕድሩ እዮም። ኣብ 1204ንሳክ ናይ ቁስጥንጥንያኦም ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ኣካይዶም። ድሒሩ ዳግማይ ክምስረት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም ክብሩ ግን ፈጺሙ ኣይምመልአን። እቶም መስቀላውያን ናብ መንገዲ ስልክ ዝምዕብሉ ናይ ንግዲ መስመራት ይምስርቱን ንንግዳውያን ሪፓብሊካት ጀኖቫን ቬኒስን ዓበይቲ ቁጠባዊ ሓይልታት ንኽኾኑ መንገዲ ይኸፍቱን። እቲ ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ምንቅስቓስ ዝነበረ ረኮንኲስታ ንኢቤሪያ ንክርስቶስት ዳግማይ ንምስዓር ሰሪሑ።

passage: There are three primary shopping centers in the Bronx: The Hub, Gateway Center and Southern Boulevard. The Hub–Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.), in The Hub, is the retail heart of the South Bronx, located where four roads converge: East 149th Street, Willis, Melrose and Third Avenues. It is primarily located inside the neighborhood of Melrose but also lines the northern border of Mott Haven. The Hub has been called 'the Broadway of the Bronx', being likened to the real Broadway in Manhattan and the northwestern Bronx. It is the site of both maximum traffic and architectural density. In configuration, it resembles a miniature Times Square, a spatial 'bow-tie' created by the geometry of the street. The Hub is part of Bronx Community Board 1.
question: The Hub-Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.) has been in addition to the real Broadway in Manhattan and the northwestern Bronx.
mc_answer1: The Hub-Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.) is the retail heart of the Bronx, located where four roads converge: East 149th Street, Willis, Melrose and Third Avenue
mc_answer2: The Hub-Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.) has been likened to the real Broadway in Manhattan and the northwestern Bronx. Question:
mc_answer3: The Hub-Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.) is the retail heart of the South Bronx, located where four roads converge?
mc_answer4: the real Broadway in Manhattan and the northwestern Bronx.
translated_passage: ኣብ ብሮንክስ ሰለስተ ቀዳሞት ማእከላት ዕዳጋ ኣለዋ: እቲ ሃብ: ኣፍደገ ማእከልን ደቡባዊ ቦውለቫርድን። Hub–Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.)፡ ኣብቲ ሃብ፡ ናይ ችርቻሮ ልቢ ደቡባዊ ብሮንክስ ኮይኑ፡ ኣርባዕተ ጽርግያታት ኣብ ዝእከበሉ ቦታ ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ምብራቕ 149 ስትሪት፡ ዊሊስ፡ ሜልሮዝን ሳልሰይቲ ጎደናታትን። ብቐንዱ ኣብ ውሽጢ ከባቢ መልሮዝ ዝርከብ ኮይኑ ግን ንሰሜናዊ ዶብ ሞት ሄቨን ዝሰርሖ እዩ። እቲ ማእከል 'The Broadway of the Bronx' ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ ኣሎ፡ ምስቲ ኣብ ማንሃታንን ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ብሮንክስን ዝርከብ ሓቀኛ ብሮድዌይ ተሰማሚዑ። ንሱ ድማ እቲ ዝለዓለ ትራፊክን ጽቕጥቕጥ ስነ ህንጻን ዝካየደሉ ቦታ እዩ። ኣብ ውቅር፡ ብጂኦሜትሪ ናይቲ ጎደና ዝተፈጥረ ቦታዊ 'ቦው-ሲ' ዝበሃል ንእሽቶ ናይ ታይምስ ስኴር ይመስል። እቲ ሃብ ኣካል ናይ ብሮንክስ ማሕበረሰብ ቦርድ 1 እዩ።
translated_question: ሃብ-ሳልሳይ ኣቨኑ ቢዝነስ ምምሕያሽ ዲስትሪክት (B.I.D.) ኣብ ርእሲ እቲ ኣብ ማንሃታንን ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ብሮንክስን ዝነበረ ሓቀኛ ብሮድዌይ ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ።
translated_mc_answer1: The Hub-Third Avenue Business Improvement District (B.I.D.) ናይ ችርቻሮ ልቢ ናይቲ ብሮንክስ ዝበሃል ናይ ችርቻሮ ልቢ ኮይኑ፡ ኣርባዕተ ጽርግያታት ዝራኸበሉ ቦታ ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ምብራቕ 149th Street, Willis, Melrose and Third Avenue
translated_mc_answer2: ሃብ-ሳልሳይ ኣቨኑ ቢዝነስ ምምሕያሽ ዲስትሪክት (B.I.D.) ምስቲ ኣብ ማንሃታንን ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ብሮንክስን ዝርከብ ሓቀኛ ብሮድዌይ ተሰማሚዑ ኣሎ። ሕቶ፥
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ሃብ-ሳልሳይ ኣቨኑ ቢዝነስ ምምሕያሽ ዲስትሪክት (B.I.D.) ኣርባዕተ ጽርግያታት ኣብ ዝራኸበሉ ቦታ ዝርከብ ናይ ሳውዝ ብሮንክስ ችርቻሮ ልቢ ድዩ?

passage: The function of Apollo as a 'healer' is connected with Paean (Παιών-Παιήων), the physician of the Gods in the Iliad, who seems to come from a more primitive religion. Paeοn is probably connected with the Mycenean pa-ja-wo-ne (Linear B: 𐀞𐀊𐀍𐀚), but this is not certain. He did not have a separate cult, but he was the personification of the holy magic-song sung by the magicians that was supposed to cure disease. Later the Greeks knew the original meaning of the relevant song 'paean' (παιάν). The magicians were also called 'seer-doctors' (ἰατρομάντεις), and they used an ecstatic prophetic art which was used exactly by the god Apollo at the oracles.

translated_passage: ተግባር ኣፖሎ ከም 'መፍሰሲ' ምስ ፓኢያን (παιών-παιήων)፡ ምስ ሓኪም ናይቶም ኣብ ኢልያድ ዝርከቡ ኣማልኽቲ፡ ካብ ዝያዳ ቀዳሞት ሃይማኖት ዝመጽእ ዝመስል፡ ይተኣሳሰር። Paeοn ምናልባት ምስ Mycenean pa-ja-wo-ne (መስመራዊ B: 𐀞𐀊 እሞፈት) ዝተኣሳሰር ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ፣ እዚ ግን ርግጸኛ ኣይኮነን። ንሱ ፍሉይ ኣምልኾ ኣይነበሮን፡ ግን ከኣ ንሕማም ክፍውሱ ዝግበኦም ስሒር ዝዝመር ቅዱስ ስሕበት-ደርፊ ስብእና እዩ ነይሩ። ጸኒሖም ግሪኻውያን ነቲ መበቈላዊ ትርጉም ናይታ ዝምልከቶ ደርፊ 'Paean' (παιάν) ይፈልጡ ነበሩ። እቶም ስሕተት 'Seer-Contors' (ἰατρομάντεις) ተባሂሎም እውን ይጽውዑ ነበሩ፣ እዚ ድማ ብልክዕ ብኣምላኽ ኣፖሎ ኣብ ኦራክለስ ዝተጠቕመሉ ፍስሃ ዝመልኦ ትንቢታዊ ስነ ጥበብ ተጠቒሞም።
translated_question: ካብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ ዓይነት ቁልፊ ቃላት ከመይ ጌርካ ክትፈልጥ ኣለካ?
translated_mc_answer1: ነቲ ምዝንባል ምጥቃም ኣብ ውሽጢ ጽሑፍ ኣገዳሲ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ግን ቅኑዕ መልሲ ክኸውን የብሉን?
translated_mc_answer2: ነዚ ዝስዕብ ሕቶ ቅኑዕ መልሲ እንታይ ክኸውን ኣለዎ?
translated_mc_answer3: ግሪኻውያን ነቲ መበቈላዊ ትርጉም ናይታ ዝምልከቶ ደርፊ 'ፓየን' () ይፈልጥዋ እዮም ()
translated_mc_answer4: እቲ ምዝንጋዕ ኣብ ትሕቲ ጽሑፍ ኣገዳሲ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ግን ቅኑዕ መልሲ ክኸውን የብሉን?

passage: The Times Literary Supplement (TLS) first appeared in 1902 as a supplement to The Times, becoming a separately paid-for weekly literature and society magazine in 1914. The Times and the TLS have continued to be co-owned, and as of 2012 the TLS is also published by News International and cooperates closely with The Times, with its online version hosted on The Times website, and its editorial offices based in Times House, Pennington Street, London.

passage: Contemporary chroniclers were mostly critical of John's performance as king, and his reign has since been the subject of significant debate and periodic revision by historians from the 16th century onwards. Historian Jim Bradbury has summarised the contemporary historical opinion of John's positive qualities, observing that John is today usually considered a 'hard-working administrator, an able man, an able general'. Nonetheless, modern historians agree that he also had many faults as king, including what historian Ralph Turner describes as 'distasteful, even dangerous personality traits', such as pettiness, spitefulness and cruelty. These negative qualities provided extensive material for fiction writers in the Victorian era, and John remains a recurring character within Western popular culture, primarily as a villain in films and stories depicting the Robin Hood legends.
question: What did Jim Bradbury think did John stand for?

mc_answer3: a 'hard-working administrator, an able man, an able general' Answer

translated_passage: ናይ ዘመና ጸሓፍቲ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ንጆን ከም ንጉስ ከም ንጉስ ዝነቕፍዎ ዝነበሩ ኮይኖም፡ ንግስነቱ ካብ ሽዑ ጀሚሩ ንግስነቱ ካብ መበል 16 ክፍለ ዘመን ጀሚሩ ብጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ ርኡይ ክትዕን በብእዋኑ ምኽልካልን ክካየድ ጸኒሑ። ጸሓፍ ታሪኽ ጂም ብራድበሪ ነቲ ናይ ዮሃንስ ኣወንታዊ ባህርያት እዋናዊ ታሪኻዊ ርእይቶ ኣጠቓሊልዎ ኣሎ፣ እዚ ኸኣ ዮሃንስ ሎሚ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም 'ተሪር ዝሰርሕ ኣመሓዳሪ፡ ብቑዕ ሰብ፡ ብቑዕ ጀነራል' ተባሂሉ ከም ዝቑጸር ብምዕዛብ። ዝኾነ ኾይኑ ዘመናውያን ጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ ከም ንጉስ እውን ብዙሕ ጌጋታት ከም ዝነበሮም ይሰማምዑ፣ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ታሪኽ ታሪኽ ራልፍ ተርነር 'ጭንቀት ዝመልኦ፡ ዋላ ሓደገኛ ባህርያት ስብእና' ኢሉ ዝገልጾ፡ ከም pettiness, spitefulness and cruelty ዝኣመሰሉ። እዚ ኣሉታዊ ባህርያት ኣብ ዘመነ ቪክቶርያ ንጸሓፍቲ ልቢ ወለድ ሰፊሕ ንዋት ዝሃበ ኮይኑ፡ ጆን ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ ምዕራባውያን ህቡብ ባህሊ ተደጋጋሚ ገጸ ባህሪ ኮይኑ ይቕጽል ኣሎ፡ ብቐንዱ ከም ዕሱብ ኣብ ፊልምታትን ዛንታታትን ንኣፈ ታሪኽ ሮቢን ሁድ ዝገልጽ እዩ።
translated_question: ጂም ብራድበሪ ንጆን እንታይ ደው ኢሉ እዩ ዝሓስብ ነይሩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ተመርኲሱ ንዝስዕብ ሕቶ ናይ ሓሶት መልሲ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ተመርኲሱ ነዚ ዝስዕብ ሕቶ ዘእምን ግን ከኣ ዘይቅኑዕ መልሲ?
translated_mc_answer3: '"ተሪር ኣመሓዳሪ ስራሕ፡ ብቑዕ ሰብ፡ ብቑዕ ጀነራል' ዝብል መልሲ"

passage: The cup triumph was also Everton's passport to the Cup Winners' Cup—their first European campaign in the post-Heysel era. Progress under Joe Royle continued in 1995–96 as they climbed to sixth place in the Premiership. A fifteenth-place finish the following season saw Royle resign towards the end of the campaign, to be temporarily replaced by club captain, Dave Watson. Howard Kendall was appointed Everton manager for the third time in 1997, but the appointment proved unsuccessful as Everton finished seventeenth in the Premiership; only avoiding relegation due to their superior goal difference over Bolton Wanderers. Former Rangers manager Walter Smith then took over from Kendall in the summer of 1998 but only managed three successive finishes in the bottom half of the table.
question: After winning the Cup, what did Everton's Cup triumph be their passport to?

translated_passage: እዚ ናይ ዋንጫ ዓወት’ውን ንኤቨርተን ናብ ዋንጫ ተዓወትቲ ዋንጫ ዝነበረ ፓስፖርት’ዩ ነይሩ- ኣብ ድሕሪ ሄይሰል ዝነበረ ዘመን ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ ኤውሮጳዊ ጎስጓስ ኤውሮጳዊ ወፍሮም’ዩ። ኣብ ትሕቲ ጆ ሮይል ዝነበረ ምዕባለ ኣብ 1995–96 ኣብ ፕረምየርሊግ ናብ ሻድሻይ ደረጃ ደይባ ክትድይብ ከላ ቀጺሉ። ኣብ ዝቐጸለ ዓመተ ስፖርት መበል ዓሰርተ ሓሙሽተ ደረጃ ሒዙ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይቲ ወፍሪ ሮይል ካብ ስልጣኑ ክለቅቕ ርእዩ፡ ንግዚኡ ብሓዳር ክለባት ዴቭ ዋትሰን ተተኪኡ። ሃዋርድ ኬንዳል ኣብ 1997 ንሳልሳይ ግዜ ኣሰልጣኒ ኤቨርተን ኮይኑ ተመዚዙ፡ እቲ ቆጸራ ግን ኤቨርተን ኣብ ፕረምየርሊግ መበል ዓሰርተው ሾብዓተ ዛዚማ ብምዝዛም እቲ ቆጸራ ከምዘይተዓወተ ተረጋጊጹ፤ ካብ ቦልተን ዋንዳረርስ ብዝለዓለ ፍልልይ ሸቶ ብዘለዎም ብሉጽ ፍልልይ ሸቶ ጥራይ ምውጋድ ጥራይ። ብድሕሪኡ ኣሰልጣኒ ሬንጀርስ ነበር ዋልተር ስሚዝ ኣብ ሓጋይ 1998 ካብ ኬንዳል ስልጣን ሒዙ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ፍርቂ ናይቲ ጠረጴዛ ግን ሰለስተ ተኸታተልቲ ውድድራት ጥራይ ኣመዝጊቡ።

translated_passage: ሰለስተ ናይ ኮሚኒቲ ኮሌጅ ኣውራጃታት ኣብ ሂዩስተንን ከባቢኣን ምስ ካምፓሳት ይርከባ። ስርዓት ኮሌጅ ሂዩስተን ኮሌጅ ንመብዛሕትኡ ሂዩስተን የገልግል። እቲ ብሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ዝርከብ ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ክፋል እታ ከተማ ብዝተፈላለዩ ካምፓሳት ናይ ሎን ስታር ኮሌጅ ስርዓት ክግልገል ከሎ፡ ደቡባዊ ምብራቕ ክፋል ሂዩስተን ድማ ብሳንያስተን ኮሌጅ ዝግልገል ኮይኑ፡ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ክፋል ድማ ብሊ ኮለጅ ይግልገል። ሂዩስተን ኮሚኒቲ ኮሌጅን ሎን ስታር ኮሌጅ ስርዓታትን ኣብ ውሽጢ 10 ዝዓበዩ ትካላት ላዕለዋይ ትምህርቲ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ይርከብ።

passage: The capital and largest city is Lahore which was the historical capital of the wider Punjab region. Other important cities include Faisalabad, Rawalpindi, Gujranwala, Sargodha, Multan, Sialkot, Bahawalpur, Gujrat, Sheikhupura, Jhelum and Sahiwal. Undivided Punjab is home to six rivers, of which five flow through Pakistani Punjab. From west to east, these are: the Indus, Jhelum, Beas, Chenab, Ravi and Sutlej. Nearly 60% of Pakistan's population lives in the Punjab. It is the nation's only province that touches every other province; it also surrounds the federal enclave of the national capital city at Islamabad. In the acronym P-A-K-I-S-T-A-N, the P is for Punjab.

passage: The first few naval battles were disasters for Rome. However, after training more sailors and inventing a grappling engine, a Roman naval force was able to defeat a Carthaginian fleet, and further naval victories followed. The Carthaginians then hired Xanthippus of Carthage, a Spartan mercenary general, to reorganise and lead their army. He cut off the Roman army from its base by re-establishing Carthaginian naval supremacy. The Romans then again defeated the Carthaginians in naval battle at the Battle of the Aegates Islands and left Carthage with neither a fleet nor sufficient coin to raise one. For a maritime power the loss of their access to the Mediterranean stung financially and psychologically, and the Carthaginians sued for peace.
question: question: What did the Carthaginians claim to have received?
mc_answer2: what did the Romans lose to the Carthaginians?
mc_answer3: Xanthippus of Carthage caused the Carthaginians to lose their access to the Mediterranean?
mc_answer4: What did the Romans claim the Carthaginians had sued for peace?

passage: Burke's last publications were the Letters on a Regicide Peace (October 1796), called forth by negotiations for peace with France by the Pitt government. Burke regarded this as appeasement, injurious to national dignity and honour. In his Second Letter, Burke wrote of the French Revolutionary Government: 'Individuality is left out of their scheme of government. The State is all in all. Everything is referred to the production of force; afterwards, everything is trusted to the use of it. It is military in its principle, in its maxims, in its spirit, and in all its movements. The State has dominion and conquest for its sole objects—dominion over minds by proselytism, over bodies by arms'.

passage: Nanjing Library, founded in 1907, houses more than 10 million volumes of printed materials and is the third largest library in China, after the National Library in Beijing and Shanghai Library. Other libraries, such as city-owned Jinling Library and various district libraries, also provide considerable amount of information to citizens. Nanjing University Library is the second largest university libraries in China after Peking University Library, and the fifth largest nationwide, especially in the number of precious collections.

passage: Spanish was nonetheless the only official language in Galicia for more than four centuries. Over the many centuries of Castilian domination, Galician faded from day-to-day use in urban areas. The period since the re-establishment of democracy in Spain—in particular since the Lei de Normalización Lingüística ('Law of Linguistic Normalization', Ley 3/1983, 15 June 1983)—represents the first time since the introduction of mass education that a generation has attended school in Galician (Spanish is also still taught in Galician schools).
question: What did the Lei de Normalización Lingüstica mean?
mc_answer1: Law of Linguistic Normalization, Ley 3/1983, 15 June 1983, has been the first since the introduction of mass education that a generation has attended school in Galician?
mc_answer3: Law of Linguistic Normalization is a 'Law of Linguistic Normalization'?
mc_answer4: What was the 'Law of Linguistic Normalization'?
translated_passage: ስጳኛ ብዝኾነ ልዕሊ ኣርባዕተ ዘመናት ኣብ ጋሊስያ እንኮ ወግዓዊ ቋንቋ እዩ ነይሩ። ኣብቲ ብዙሕ ዘመናት ዝነበረ ካስቲልያዊ ዕብለላ፡ ጋሊሽያን ኣብ ከተማታት ካብ መዓልታዊ ኣጠቓቕማ ኣትሒዙ ይሃስስ ነበረ። ኣብ ስጳኛ ዳግማይ ምምስራት ዲሞክራሲ ካብ ዝኣቱ ጀሚሩ-ብፍላይ ካብ ሌይ ዲኖይዛስዮን ሊንጉይስቲካ ('ሕጊ ቋንቋ ንቡር ንቡር ምግባር'፣ ለይ 3/1983)፣ 15 ሰነ 1983)—ሓደ ወለዶ ኣብ ጋሊስያ ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ ዝመሃር ዝነበረ ጅምላዊ ትምህርቲ ካብ ዝኣቱ ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ዝውክል) ካብ ዝውከል ግዜ ዝውክል እዩ።
translated_question: LEI ናይ ቋንቋ ደረጃ ምውሳን እንታይ ማለት እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ሕጊ ስነ-ቋንቋዊ ንቡር ምግባር፡ ለይ 3/1983፡ 15 ሰነ 1983፡ ሓደ ወለዶ ኣብ ጋሊሽያን ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ ዝመሃር ዝነበረ ጃምላዊ ትምህርቲ ካብ ዝኣቱ ጀሚሩ፡ ናይ መጀመርታ ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ?

passage: In the 1970s, computer engineers at research institutions throughout the United States began to link their computers together using telecommunications technology. The effort was funded by ARPA (now DARPA), and the computer network that resulted was called the ARPANET. The technologies that made the Arpanet possible spread and evolved.

translated_passage: ኣብ 1970ታት፡ ኣብ መላእ ኣመሪካ ኣብ ዝርከባ ትካላት መጽናዕቲ ዝርከቡ መሃንድሳት ኮምፒተር፡ ቴክኖሎጂ ቴሌኮሙኒኬሽን ተጠቒሞም ኮምፒተራቶም ብሓባር ከራኽብዎ ጀሚሮም። እቲ ጻዕሪ ብኣርፓ (ሕጂ ዳርፓ) ዝተመወለ ኮይኑ፡ እቲ ውጽኢቱ ዝኾነ መርበብ ኮምፒተር ድማ ኣርፓኔት ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ ነበረ። እቲ ኣርፓኔት ክዝርጋሕን ዝማዕበለን ዝነበረ ቴክኖሎጂታት።

passage: The Croatian Latin alphabet (Gajica) followed suit shortly afterwards, when Ljudevit Gaj defined it as standard Latin with five extra letters that had diacritics, apparently borrowing much from Czech, but also from Polish, and inventing the unique digraphs 'lj', 'nj' and 'dž'. These digraphs are represented as 'ļ, ń and ǵ' respectively in the 'Rječnik hrvatskog ili srpskog jezika', published by the former Yugoslav Academy of Sciences and Arts in Zagreb. The latter digraphs, however, are unused in the literary standard of the language. All in all, this makes Serbo-Croatian the only Slavic language to officially use both the Latin and Cyrillic scripts, albeit the Latin version is more commonly used.
question: What type of question can be answered in serbo-Croatian?
mc_answer1: What is the only Slavic language to officially use both the Latin and Cyrillic scripts?

translated_passage: እቲ ክሮኤሽያዊ ላቲን ፊደል (ጋጂካ) ድሕሪ ቁሩብ ግዜ ስዒባቶ፡ ልጁደቪት ጋጅ ከም መደበኛ ላቲን ከም መደበኛ ላቲን ከም ሓሙሽተ ተወሳኺ ፊደላት ምስ ገሊጽዎ፡ ዲያክሪቲክስ ዝነበሮም፡ ካብ ፖሊሽ ብዙሕ ዝልቃሕ ዝመስል፡ ግን ከኣ ካብ ፖሊሽ ብዙሕ ዝተለቅሐ ይመስል፡ ነቲ ፍሉይ ዲግራፍ 'LJ'፡ 'NJ'ን 'Dž'ን ዝፍልፍል እዩ። እዞም ዲግራፍ እዚኣቶም ኣብቲ ብቕደም ተኸተል ኣብ ዛግረብ ብዩጎዝላቭ ኣካዳሚ ስነ-ፍልጠትን ስነጥበብን ዩጎዝላቭ ዝተሓትመ 'Rječnik Hrvatskog Ili Srpskog Jezika' ብቕደም ተኸተል 'ļ, ń and ' ዝውከሉ እዮም። እዞም ዳሕረዎት ዲግራፍ ግን ኣብቲ ስነ-ጽሑፋዊ መለክዒ ናይቲ ቋንቋ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣይወዓዉን። ብሓፈሻ እዚ ሰርቦ-ክሮኤሽያዊ ንኽልቲኡ ላቲንን ሲሪሊክን ስክሪፕት ብወግዒ ንምጥቃም እንኮ ስላቭ ቋንቋ ይገብሮ፣ ዋላ እኳ እቲ ላቲናዊ ስሪት ብዝያዳ ዝጥቀመሉ እንተኾነ።
translated_question: ኣብ ሰርቦ-ክሮኤሽያዊ እንታይ ዓይነት ሕቶ ክምለስ ይኽእል?

passage: The Sun switched support to the Labour party on 18 March 1997, six weeks before the General Election victory which saw the New Labour leader Tony Blair become Prime Minister with a large parliamentary majority, despite the paper having attacked Blair and New Labour up to a month earlier. Its front page headline read THE SUN BACKS BLAIR and its front page editorial made clear that while it still opposed some New Labour policies, such as the Minimum Wage and Devolution, it believed Blair to be 'the breath of fresh air this great country needs'. John Major's Conservatives, it said, were 'tired, divided and rudderless'. Blair, who had radically altered his party's image and policies, noting the influence the paper could have over its readers' political thinking, had courted it (and Murdoch) for some time by granting exclusive interviews and writing columns.
question: The Sun's front page headline read THE SUN BACKS BLAIR and its front page editorial made clear that Blair had been the ' breath of fresh air this great country needs' before the general election victory?
mc_answer1: The Sun's front page headline read THE SUN BACKS BLAIR and its front page editorial said that Blair was 'the breath of fresh air this great country needs' before the general election victory.
mc_answer2: The Sun's front page headline read THE SUN BACKS BLAIR and its front page editorial made clear that Blair was 'the breath of fresh air this great country needs'

translated_passage: ሳን ደገፍ ናብ ሰልፊ ዕዮ ብ18 መጋቢት 1997 ቀይራ፣ ቅድሚ እቲ ሓድሽ መራሒ ዕዮ ቶኒ ብሌር ዝነበረ ሓፈሻዊ ዓወት ምርጫ ሽዱሽተ ሰሙን ቅድሚ ሽዱሽተ ሰሙን ቅድሚ ሓደ ወርሒ እንተሃለወ፣ እቲ ወረቐት ንብሌርን ሓድሽ ዕዮን ቅድሚ ሓደ ወርሒ ኣጥቂዑ እንተሃለወ። ኣብ ቀዳማይ ገጹ ኣርእስቲ ናቱ ኣንቢቡ ንሻን ባክስ ብሌርን ኣብ ቀዳማይ ገጹ ኣዳላዊት ኣዳላዊት ኣዳላውነት ከም ዝገለጾን ገና ገለ ሓደስቲ ናይ ዕዮ ፖሊሲታት ከም ናይ ዝተሓተ ደሞዝን ምምቕራሕን ከም ዝቃወም እኳ እንተገለጸ፡ ብሌር 'እዛ ዓባይ ሃገር ዘድልያ ትንፋስ ንጹህ ኣየር' ምዃና ከም ዝኣምን ከም ዝኣምን ብንጹር ኣፍሊጡ። ዓቃባውያን ጆን ሜጀር፡ 'ደናግሮ፡ ተኸፋፊሎምን መንኮርኮር ዘይብሎምን' ምዃኖም ገሊጹ። እቲ ጽሑፍ ኣብ ልዕሊ ፖለቲካዊ ኣተሓሳስባ ኣንበብቱ ክህልዎ ዝኽእል ጽልዋ ብምጥቃስ፡ ምስልን ፖሊሲታትን ሰልፉ ብሱር በተኽ ዝቐየሮ ብሌር፡ ፍሉይ ቃለ-መጠይቕ ብምሃብን ዓምድታት ብምጽሓፍን ንዝተወሰነ እዋን ኣጽዲቑዎ ነይሩ (ንሙርዶክን) ኣጽዲቑዎ ነይሩ።

translated_mc_answer1: ኣርእስቲ ናይቲ ጸሓይ ኣብ ቅድሚት ገጽ ዘ ሳን ባክስ ብሌር ኣንቢቡን ኣብ ቀዳማይ ገጹ ኣዳላዊት ኣዳላዊት ድማ ብሌር ቅድሚ እቲ ሓፈሻዊ ዓወት ምርጫ 'እዛ ዓባይ ሃገር ዘድልያ ንጹህ ኣየር' ከም ዝነበረት ገሊጻ።
translated_mc_answer2: ናይ ጸሓይ ናይ ቅድሚት ገጽ ኣርእስቲ ዘንብባ The Sun Backs Blair and Ford Page itsed editorial ኣንቢባ ብሌር 'እዛ ዓባይ ሃገር ዘድልያ ትንፋስ ንጹህ ኣየር' ምዃና ብንጹር ኣፍሊጡ።
translated_mc_answer3: ናይ ጸሓይ ናይ ቅድሚት ገጽ ኣርእስቲ ኣንቢብዎ The Sun Backs Blair and front page itsed editorial ፡ ብሌር ' ትንፋስ ንጹህ ኣየር እዛ ዓባይ ሃገር ዘድልያ' ምዃና ብንጹር ገሊጾም።

passage: After the President signs a bill into law (or Congress enacts it over his veto), it is delivered to the Office of the Federal Register (OFR) of the National Archives and Records Administration (NARA) where it is assigned a law number, and prepared for publication as a slip law. Public laws, but not private laws, are also given legal statutory citation by the OFR. At the end of each session of Congress, the slip laws are compiled into bound volumes called the United States Statutes at Large, and they are known as session laws. The Statutes at Large present a chronological arrangement of the laws in the exact order that they have been enacted.
question: The Passage of the U.S. Statutes at Large presents a chronological arrangement of the laws in the exact order that they have been enacted.

translated_passage: እቲ ፕረዚደንት ናብ ሕጊ ዝቐረበ እማመ ድሕሪ ምፍራሙ (ወይ ኮንግረስ ብሰንኪ ቬቶኡ የውጽእ)፡ ናብ ቤት ጽሕፈት ፌደራላዊ መዝገብ (OFR) ናይ ሃገራዊ ማህደርን መዛግብትን ምምሕዳር (NARA) ቁጽሪ ሕጊ ዝምደበሉን ከም ስሊፕ ሕጊ ንኽሕተም ዝተዳለወን ቤት ጽሕፈት ይበጽሕ። ህዝባዊ ሕግታት፡ ግን ከኣ ናይ ብሕቲ ሕግታት ዘይኮነ፡ ብOFR ሕጋዊ ሕጋዊ ምጥቃስ እውን ይወሃቦ። ኣብ መወዳእታ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ኣኼባ ጉባኤ፡ እቶም ሕግታት ስሊፕ ኣብ ዝተኣስሩ ጥራዛት ይእከቡ፡ ብሓፈሻዊ ስርዓት ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ይበሃሉ፡ ብሕግታት ኣኼባ ድማ ይፍለጡ። እቲ ሕግታት ብሓፈሻዊ ስርዓት ናይቲ ሕግታት ብትኽክለኛ ስርዓት ብቕደም ተኸተል የቕርቡ።
translated_question: ምሕላፍ ሕግታት ኣመሪካ ብሓፈሻኡ፡ ብቕደም ተኸተል ናይቲ ሕግታት ብቕደም ተኸተል ብቕደም ተኸተል ብቕደም ተኸተል የቕርብ።

passage: The development of New Imperialism saw the conquest of nearly all eastern hemisphere territories by colonial powers. The commercial colonization of India commenced in 1757, after the Battle of Plassey, when the Nawab of Bengal surrendered his dominions to the British East India Company, in 1765, when the Company was granted the diwani, or the right to collect revenue, in Bengal and Bihar, or in 1772, when the Company established a capital in Calcutta, appointed its first Governor-General, Warren Hastings, and became directly involved in governance.
question: After 1757, when the British East India Company gave its first Governor-General, Warren Hastings, and became directly involved in governance?
mc_answer2: 1757, when the British East India Company gave its first Governor-General, Warren Hastings, and became directly involved in governance.

passage: At the same time the order found itself face to face with the Renaissance. It struggled against pagan tendencies in Renaissance humanism, in Italy through Dominici and Savonarola, in Germany through the theologians of Cologne but it also furnished humanism with such advanced writers as Francesco Colonna (probably the writer of the Hypnerotomachia Poliphili) and Matteo Bandello. Many Dominicans took part in the artistic activity of the age, the most prominent being Fra Angelico and Fra Bartolomeo.

passage: Washington University has over 300 undergraduate student organizations on campus. Most are funded by the Washington University Student Union, which has a $2 million plus annual budget that is completely student-controlled and is one of the largest student government budgets in the country. Known as SU for short, the Student Union sponsors large-scale campus programs including WILD (a semesterly concert in the quad) and free copies of the New York Times, USA Today, and the St. Louis Post-Dispatch through The Collegiate Readership Program; it also contributes to the Assembly Series, a weekly lecture series produced by the University, and funds the campus television station, WUTV, and the radio station, KWUR. KWUR was named best radio station in St. Louis of 2003 by the Riverfront Times despite the fact that its signal reaches only a few blocks beyond the boundaries of the campus. There are 11 fraternities and 9 sororities, with approximately 35% of the student body being involved in Greek life. The Congress of the South 40 (CS40) is a Residential Life and Events Programming Board, which operates outside of the SU sphere. CS40's funding comes from the Housing Activities Fee of each student living on the South 40.
question: What is the question that Washington University has?
mc_answer1: How is the Washington University Student Union funded?
mc_answer2: What is the correct answer for the other?

translated_passage: ዋሽንግተን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ኣብ ቀጽሪ ልዕሊ 300 ናይ መጀመርታ ዲግሪ ናይ ተማሃሮ ትካላት ኣለዉዎ። መብዛሕትኦም ብማሕበር ተማሃሮ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዋሽንግተን ዝምወሉ ኮይኖም፡ እዚ ድማ ምሉእ ብምሉእ ብተማሃሮ ዝቆጻጸርን ኣብታ ሃገር ካብ ዘለዉ ዓበይቲ ናይ ተማሃሮ መንግስቲ ባጀት ሓደን ዶላር ተወሲኹዎ ዓመታዊ ባጀት ዘለዎ ዓመታዊ ባጀት ኣለዎ። ብሓጺሩ SU ዝፍለጥ ማሕበር ተማሃሮ፡ ዋይልድ (ናይ ሰሚስተርሊ ኮንሰርት ኣብ ኳድ) ከምኡ’ውን ነጻ ቅዳሓት ናይ ኒውዮርክ ታይምስ፡ USA TODAY፡ ከምኡ’ውን ሴንት ሉዊስ ድሕሪ ዲስፓች ብመንገዲ መደብ ኣንበብቲ ኮሌጅ፡ ነጻ ናይ ካምፓስ መደባት ይምውል፤ ብተወሳኺ ኣብቲ ብዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝተዳለወ ሰሙናዊ ተኸታታሊ ኣስተምህሮ ኣብቲ ተኸታታሊ ኣኼባ ኣበርክቶ ይገብር፣ ከምኡ’ውን ንመደበር ተለቪዥን ካምፓስ፣ WUTV፣ ከምኡውን መደበር ሬድዮ፣ KWUR ይምውል። ክዉር ኣብ ሴንት ሉዊስ 2003 ብሉጽ ሬድዮ ጣብያ ብሪቨርፍሮንት ታይምስ ተባሂላ ተሸሊማ ምልክትኣ ካብ ዶባት ናይቲ ቀጽሪ ወጻኢ ውሑዳት ብሎኮታት ጥራይ ትበጽሕ እኳ እንተነበራ። 11 ሕውነትን 9 ሶሮሪቲታትን ኣለዋ፣ ኣስታት 35% ናይቲ ኣብ ህይወት ግሪኽ ዝሳተፍ ኣካል ተማሃሮ ድማ ኣሎ። ኮንግረስ ደቡብ 40 (CS40) ካብ ሱ ስፌር ወጻኢ ዝሰርሕ ናይ መንበሪ ዕድመን ፍጻሜታትን ፕሮግራሚንግ ቦርድ እዩ። ናይ CS40 ምወላ ካብ ናይ ኣባይቲ ንጥፈታት ክፍሊት ናይ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ተማሃራይ ኣብ ደቡብ 40 ዝነብር እዩ።

passage: The Premier League is a corporation in which the 20 member clubs act as shareholders. Seasons run from August to May. Teams play 38 matches each (playing each team in the league twice, home and away), totalling 380 matches in the season. Most games are played on Saturday and Sunday afternoons; others during weekday evenings. It is currently sponsored by Barclays Bank and thus officially known as the Barclays Premier League and is colloquially known as the Premiership. Outside the UK it is commonly referred to as the English Premier League (EPL).

passage: There are a few types of existing bilaterians that lack a recognizable brain, including echinoderms, tunicates, and acoelomorphs (a group of primitive flatworms). It has not been definitively established whether the existence of these brainless species indicates that the earliest bilaterians lacked a brain, or whether their ancestors evolved in a way that led to the disappearance of a previously existing brain structure.

passage: Hokkien, especially Taiwanese, is sometimes written in the Latin script using one of several alphabets. Of these the most popular is Pe̍h-ōe-jī (traditional Chinese: 白話字; simplified Chinese: 白话字; pinyin: Báihuàzì). POJ was developed first by Presbyterian missionaries in China and later by the indigenous Presbyterian Church in Taiwan; use of this alphabet has been actively promoted since the late 19th century. The use of a mixed script of Han characters and Latin letters is also seen, though remains uncommon. Other Latin-based alphabets also exist.
question: What does POJ do?
mc_answer2: what did the indigenous Presbyterian Church in Taiwan develop?
mc_answer3: - What is the purpose of POJ?
mc_answer4: What was POJ developed first by Presbyterian missionaries in China?
translated_passage: ሆኪየን ብፍላይ ታይዋን ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ኣብ ስክሪፕት ላቲን ካብ ሓያሎ ፊደላት ሓደ ተጠቒሙ ይጽሓፍ። ካብዚኦም እቲ ዝያዳ ተፈታዊ ዝኾነ pečh-ōe-jī (ባህላዊ ቻይናዊ: 白話字; ዝተቐለለ ቻይናዊ: 白话字; Pinyin: Báihuàzì) እዩ። ፖጅ መጀመርታ ብፕረስቢተርያን ሚስዮናውያን ኣብ ቻይና ድሒሩ ድማ ብደቀባት ፕረስቢተርያን ቤተክርስትያን ታይዋን እዩ ተማሂዙ፤ እዚ ፊደል እዚ ምጥቃም ካብ መወዳእታ 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ጀሚሩ ብንጥፈት ይድገፍ ኣሎ። ናይ ሃን ገጸ ባህርያትን ላቲን ደብዳቤታትን ዝተሓዋወሰ ስክሪፕት ምጥቃም እውን ልሙድ እኳ እንተዘይኮነ። ካልኦት ላቲን መሰረት ዝገበሩ ፊደላት እውን ኣለዉ።

passage: The Party of Reconstruction in Sicily, which claimed 40,000 members in 1944, campaigned for Sicily to be admitted as a U.S. state. This party was one of several Sicilian separatist movements active after the downfall of Italian Fascism. Sicilians felt neglected or underrepresented by the Italian government after the annexation of 1861 that ended the rule of the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies based in Naples. The large population of Sicilians in America and the American-led Allied invasion of Sicily in July–August 1943 may have contributed to the sentiment.
